general_requirements.statewide_program_name: Electrical permits required through ND State Electrical Board. Building permits required in cities like Fargo, Bismarck, Grand Forks.

interconnection.net_metering_details: Net metering available for systems up to 100 kW. Xcel Energy, Montana-Dakota Utilities primary providers.

special_considerations.wind_load_requirements: High wind area. Design wind speeds 100-115 mph.
special_considerations.snow_load_requirements: Significant snow loads 30-50 psf ground snow load.

licensing.license_type: State Electrical Contractor license required for all electrical work.

notes: Very low solar adoption. Cold climate and limited incentives. Electrical permits managed by ND State Electrical Board.
